intro: This is {sitename}. We are here to protect abandoned Persian games from being lost. Did you have information or copy of games which we didn't? You can help us.
tgIntroUnderFiles: You can also download the files from our Telegram channel:
joinTG: Join the Old Persian Games Telegram channel
gameSelling: This game is being sold by the publisher/producer and it is not possible to download from this website. To get this work, buy it from official sources.
downloadOnlyFromTG: It is possible to download this game only through the Telegram channel. Enter the Telegram channel {tgchannel} and search for the name of this game.
defectsIntro: It seems the archived work has some defects. You can contribute to completing these deficiencies:
copyrightDetails: All archived works are subject to the copyright of the producers and the publishers, and if the copyright holders are not satisfied with their files being published, the files will be removed from access.
subtitle: Subtitled
